lead_paragraph: The bankruptcy auction of Atlantic City's former Revel Casino Hotel ground into its third day early Wednesday as lawyers for the bankrupt resort continued to weigh bids.

headline.main: Revel Auction Still Taking Bids, Did Not Adjourn
headline.print_headline: Revel Auction Still Taking Bids, Did Not Adjourn

snippet: The bankruptcy auction of Atlantic City's former Revel Casino Hotel ground into its third day early Wednesday as lawyers for the bankrupt resort continued to weigh bids....
